definitions.text: one of the jointed appendages of an animal used for locomotion or grasping: arm; leg; wing; flipper
any of the main branches arising from the trunk or a bough of a tree
(astronomy) the circumferential edge of the apparent disc of the sun or the moon or a planet
either of the two halves of a bow from handle to tip
examples: the upper limb of the bow

definitions.text: the graduated arc that is attached to an instrument for measuring angles
any projection that is thought to resemble a human arm
examples: the arm of the record player
